messages.title: WILLIE AND MING BACK WENDY TO WIN
messages.content: Liberal Democrat MSP for North East Fife, Willie Rennie and former leader Ming Campbell are both backing Wendy Chamberlain to win on 12 December.

messages.title: SPECIAL REPORT ON THE BEST CHOICE AS OUR NEXT MP: WENDY CHAMBERLAIN
messages.content: "I'll fight for a better deal for North East Fife" - Popular Liberal Democrat campaigner, Wendy Chamberlain is challenging to take North East Fife back from the SNP.

messages.title: It's SO close in North East Fife
messages.content: There are JUST TWO VOTES between the Liberal Democrats and the SNP here in North East Fife. Every single vote will make a difference. You really will decide if it's SNP or Lib Dem here.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Wendy Chamberlain will fight for a better deal for North East Fife.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Just two votes separated the Liberal Democrats and the SNP in the General Election 2017, making it a very close contest.

leaflet.personalStatement: As a former police officer, I know the importance of public safety. It's why I want to stand up for North East Fife and get a better deal for local people.

endorsements.endorsement: I have seen first-hand Wendy's energy and determination. She will make a first class MP and someone who will always put this area first.

images.caption: Liberal Democrat MSP Willie Rennie and former leader Ming Campbell both backing Wendy Chamberlain to win.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The election of North East Fife's MP is set for another 'photo finish' between SNP and Wendy Chamberlain and the two votes separated the two parties last time - the closest result.
